by camichats

A month and a half ago, Rhodey was kidnapped and replaced with a Skrull without anyone noticing. In that time, he and Tony got together. Now though, they know he’s a Skrull, and Tony tries to figure out how to live with what’s happened.

summary: It Wasn’t You
title: It Wasn’t You
body:
Created for IronHusbands Bingo

Name: It Wasn’t You

Square: I5-Skrulls

Warning(s): Non-graphic Non-Con (Tony thinks it’s Rhodey, it’s actually a Skrull)

Pairing: Tony Stark/James Rhodes

Summary: A month and a half ago, Rhodey was kidnapped and replaced with a Skrull without anyone noticing. In that time, he and Tony got together. Now though, they know he’s a Skrull, and Tony tries to figure out how to live with what’s happened.

blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

summary: Honey, It Happened!
title: Honey, It Happened!
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2WR2neQ

by DrogonTheDragon

“Steve, calm down. What happened?”

“Peter crawled!”

Tony stopped moving. He could feel his heartbeat drumming in his ears. Did he miss Peter crawl for the first time? How was that even possible? He was always with Peter. Always.

Words: 1137, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 4 of Momentous Moments

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Tony Stark, Steve Rogers, Peter Parker
  • Relationships: Steve Rogers/Tony Stark, Peter Parker & Steve Rogers & Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Baby Peter Parker, Superfamily, Superhusbands, Tony Stark Needs a Hug


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2WR2neQ

Tony stopped moving. He could feel his heartbeat drumming in his ears. Did he miss Peter crawl for the first time? How was that even possible? He was always with Peter. Always.

by The_silent_smile

In which Peter tried to figure out how to cope with an issue. And a newfound friend gladly helps him.

-Or-

The one where Peter tells the team he’s trans with the help of Loki and finds out some new interesting fact about his mentor on the way.
Perhaps he even urges him to tell the team as well. And perhaps the team react differently than they had before

summary:
Peter: I ain’t talking.
Tony, after finding out Peter got hurt on a mission but didn’t say anything and begins to pull out a...
body:
Peter: I ain’t talking.

Tony, after finding out Peter got hurt on a mission but didn’t say anything and begins to pull out a knife: I got ways of making people talk.

Peter:

Tony: *cuts a piece of cake*

Peter: Can I have some?

Tony: Cake is for talkers!

tags: pepper is scary when she's mad and she would absolutely kill someone
summary: Tony finds out that Hammer addressed Pepper as "sweetheart" during the hammerdrone debacle and shows up in prison with his...
body: Tony finds out that Hammer addressed Pepper as “sweetheart” during the hammerdrone debacle and shows up in prison with his repulser already fired up and tells Hammer that if he ever patronizes pepper like that again, he’ll cram a repulser beam so far down his throat he’ll be shitting lasers for a week. It’s not because Tony is possessive or because pepper cant handle herself. Rather, the opposite. It would be a mercy because Tony literally had to suit up to stop pepper from setting about completely destroying hammer once she remembered what he said when the action was over
